pull.title: Bugfix: ensure consistency of m_failed_blocks after reconsiderblock
pull.body: This was introduced in 015a5258adffb0cf394f387a95ac9c8afc34cfc3 and could cause a node to crash (due to assertion failure) when using the `reconsiderblock` rpc.

events.body: I think this should be marked for backport.

events.message: Bugfix: ensure consistency of m_failed_blocks after reconsiderblock
